Reference

All functions

All_Flight_Left

Drone flight Left

All_Flight_Right

Drone flight Right

deg_to_rad()

Convert degree to radians

forward_overlap()

Calculate forward overlap

get_HFOV()

Get Horizontal Field of view

get_photo_area()

Calculate the area of a drone image

get_strip_width()

Calculate the strip width (two cameras on the drone)

get_tables()

Extract all csv files from a nested folder on your local computer

get_VFOV()

Get Vertical Field of view

GSD()

Ground sampling distance (Spatial Resolution)

jolly2()

Calculate Jolly II estimate and 95% Confidence Interval

plot_trapezoid()

Plot the dimensions of the photograph

rad_to_deg()

Convert radians to degrees

run_kulan_model()

Calculate Bayesian estimate and 95% HDI

side_overlap()

Calculate the side overlap

sim_kulan_data()

Simulate a dataset

theme_dark_blue()

Theme choices: theme_publication https://github.com/koundy/ggplot_theme_Publication

theme_dark_grey()

Theme choices: theme_publication https://github.com/koundy/ggplot_theme_Publication

theme_Publication()

Theme choices: theme_publication https://github.com/koundy/ggplot_theme_Publication
